void Init (  Int  total_particles_count_  ) 
 

Initializes particle system.

Every time you'll call this function, it'll reallocate memory for particles storage. Call this function before you will work with particle system.

Parameters:
total_particles_count_ - total particles count.

Bool IsAlive (   ) 
 

Returns alive flag value.

Returns:
Returns True if particle system is alive, else - False.

Member Data Documentation

Bool is_alive [protected]
 

Alive flag.

You should to set yourself this flag to True to start particles system. If all emitted particles will die this flag sets to False.
